name: KILL HIM
description:
This game was made in about an hour and a half for the "Monthly Scratch Jam #4" 

~~instructions~~

Hover the block over the purple shooters to shoot a laser, the laser will kill him unless it hits his shield.  Don't give up because though it may seem impossible, it is possible.  The objective is to kill him, of course.

Have fun.

P.S

I will most likely update the game at some point, but until then keep trying.
